title: Trump Links Diet Soda to Weight Gain but Continues Drinking
snippets: In 2012, Trump suggested diet soda might be connected to weight gain before writing, “The Coca Cola company is not happy with me — that’s okay, I’ll still keep drinking that garbage.”
titles: Coke tight-lipped on Trump’s promise to make American Coke with real sugar again

title: Couche-Tard Ends Bid to Acquire 7-Eleven's Parent Company
snippets: Canada’s convenience store giant backed away from a blockbuster bid set to dramatically expanded its convenience store empire, when it pulled its proposal to buy the parent company of rival 7-Eleven on Wednesday. Alimentation Couche-Tard has spent nearly a year courting Seven & i Holdings
titles: Couche-Tard ends bid for 7-Eleven parent company over ‘lack of good faith engagement’
summary: Canada's Alimentation Couche-Tard withdrew its bid to acquire Seven & i Holdings, the parent company of 7-Eleven, after nearly a year of negotiations. This decision ends Couche-Tard's attempt to significantly expand its convenience store empire through this acquisition.
constructiveness_reason: This story provides basic awareness about a business decision but does not offer any deeper insights or implications for the reader. It lacks context about why the deal fell through, what it means for the companies involved, or the broader implications for the industry.

titles: NASA Invites Media to Marshall’s 65th Anniversary Celebration July 19

title: Jumping Spiders Mimic Wasps for Protection, Study Finds
snippets: Some jumping spiders look so much like wasps that scientists named them for the predatory insects.
titles: Jumping spider's visual trickery can fool AI
summary: Scientists have discovered jumping spiders that closely resemble wasps in appearance, leading them to name these spiders after the predatory insects. This mimicry is a form of adaptation that likely helps the spiders avoid predators by masquerading as more dangerous wasps.
constructiveness_reason: This story offers basic awareness about an interesting scientific discovery. It provides some insight into the adaptive behaviors of jumping spiders, but it doesn't provide actionable information or discuss broader implications for the reader.

title: 8 Children Born Through IVF With Donor Mitochondria Thrive, Avoid Genetic Diseas
snippets: Eight children who were at risk of serious genetic conditions have hit all of their developmental milestones after donor mitochondria was used during their IVF conception
titles: Children conceived using mitochondria from a donor are now doing well
summary: Eight children, conceived through IVF with donor mitochondria to avoid serious genetic conditions, have successfully met all their developmental milestones. This innovative approach aims to prevent the transmission of mitochondrial diseases from mother to child.
